dict.string: This template builds a custom patch for Quartz Composer as a QCPlugIn subclass.

# This shell script simply copies the built plug-in to "~/Library/Graphics/Quartz Composer Plug-Ins" and overrides any previous version at that location
mkdir -p "$USER_LIBRARY_DIR/Graphics/Quartz Composer Plug-Ins" rm -rf "$USER_LIBRARY_DIR/Graphics/Quartz Composer Plug-Ins/___PACKAGENAME___.plugin" cp -rf "$BUILT_PRODUCTS_DIR/___PACKAGENAME___.plugin" "$USER_LIBRARY_DIR/Graphics/Quartz Composer Plug-Ins/"
